price: Hanyuma nanabatangarije (mu ijwi riranguruye) ndetse nanababwira mu ibanga.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
